description.en:
Broadcasts of the channels RTL 4,5,7 & 8.

Watch all RTL shows and episodes of the past 7 days via RTL XL.

[B]Most of the streams of RTL XL are protected by DRM and can only be streamed from inside The Netherlands.[/B]
